external.title: Introducing Markdown for Agents

record.text:
This looks decently cool, and buries the lead a bit.

blog.cloudflare.com/markdown-for...

For those who don't know, a server could always use the Accept header to request one or more types.

And any clever server can return things as more than one content type.

Was doing this in 2012.
